subject: Re: Plug in for PDF invoices

full_threads.body: Logged 3H to Harvest
@ricaV2 +3hrs Thanks!

Hi Lee,

We have updated the additional changes and confirmed that this is now on the live site. We have set the attachment pdf to "New order" email and "Processing order" email.

Hi Joel
Yes, good to go.
On the email can u just remove the lines:
"Your order details are shown below for your regerence"
And
"Thanks for using staging… kinsta cloud"
Thanks
Lee

Hi Lee,

Awesome, let us know if you want us to set this up on the live site.

Perfect, thanks
Lee:)

Hi Lee,

Confirming we have updated the pdf and email. Please see the attached files.

hi Joel,

Thans for the tip Marjorie.

Joel does the pdf show up as an attachment? Can you then label the attachment as "Receipt" rather than "Invoice"

and maybe the Invoice No. change to Invoice/Receipt No.

Change invoice date to "Date"

and put below the bottom total:

"This order has been paid in full"

Can u also change the "Total Inc" to "Total"

For the email then I would delete all the lens info (everything from below the tax invoice in bold) as it is all on the PDF.

In its place I would put:

Please see the attached PDF for full order details, including information required for private health fund claiming.

We will email you when your order is processed for shipping.

Thank you for shopping with Total Contacts.

is ok?

thanks
Lee

Hi Joel,

I think the other issue with this is that health funds expect this to show that the patient has paid in full.

Could we change the Total to be Total Paid?

This might stop some of the invoice requests as health funds won't pay the px if it looks like there is a total outstanding.

Kind regards,

Marjorie


​http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/

https://www.facebook.com/totalcontacts

Hi Lee,

Confirming we have updated the pdf brackets. Please see the attached. 

Regarding the email, We have attached the screenshot of the "Thank you order". 
Let me the changes to the text.

Thanks Joel.

Could you just take the outer brackets off around quantity, base curve, diameter etc.

Also, how will we change the content of the email the customer receives. Can you remind me what it currently is? This will show as a pdf attachement, so we need some text to say:

thank you for yoour order.....

A tax invoice which includes all details for private healtrh fund claiming is attached....

.....

Can you show me the current version?

Thanks
Lee

Hi Lee,

Sure, please see the updated pdf. Let me know if this works

hi Joel

Thanks for that.

Sorry again:


  1. There no real need for the customer email and phone in shipping address. Can u take those out?

  2. In the tablew, can u put a line space below the details of the right eye order, so its easier to read?

  3. The health fund code is listed twice: under the lens type and again in bold at the bottom. Can u take out the higher one? No need for it twice.

  4. Can you take out the Quantity (R) and (L) at the bottom. The health fund codes are often for two eyes, so this creates confusion

  5. Can you space each section a bit more thru the page so its easier to read


Thanks so much
Lee

Hi Lee,

Sure, we have updated the pdf. Please see the attached.

hi Joel,

Sorry to be particular:)


  1. On the Header, can u remove "total Contacts" text, as the logo is there.

  2. Can u put the ABN below the address rather than next to it

  3. Can u put the Customer details on the left, shipping address on the right

  4. Can you space that middle section out more to fill the space and make it easier to read (put gap b4 above shipping address and below)

  5. Can the health fund code go in the "info for private health claiming? If not, please change that heading to "Provider Details for Private Health Fund Claiming"

  6. The product details are very small and squashed....hard to folw. Can we increase the font size and have line spaces under the health fund code, and RE to LE details.

  7. Can we delete the (I have a prescription ......) line, this is confusing in the invoice). If we keep that line/selection in the main email part, then WE can still identify which orders need us to enter the prescription.


Does that make sense?
Call me if you prefer, 0400 735865

Lee:)

Hi Lee,

We have made some updates. Please see the attached. Let me know if this works for you.

hi Joel

Can you change Billing details to "Customer Details" and Shipping Details to "Shipping Address"

We need to have the hleath fund information in there as clearly as possible. So each invoice needs, below the billing/shipping:

Information for Private Health Fund Claiming:

Provider Name: Lee Baumwol

Provider Number: 4540444J

Provider Address: 99 Macquarie St HOBART TAS 7000

Health Fund Code and Quantity: (can u put it here rather than below??)

For the header, Company info i would put address and ABN
99 Macquarie St Hobart 7000 ABN: 52840722144

For the footer i would put this:

http://www.totalcontacts.com.au/ Email: info@totalcontacts.com.au

is ok?

Thanks
Lee
Logged 2H to Harvest
@ricaV2 +2hrs

Hi Lee,

We are working on this one on staging. Here is a sample pdf that will be attached to the email. 
We need the details with the red underline (Please see the attached).
Regarding the invoice number do you have a specific format for this one?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
hi Joel
Hope u r well. Just wanted to check in re this one. Any progress?

Thanks
Lee

Optometrist
